description: HP is aware of a potential security vulnerability in HP t430 and t638 Thin Client PCs. These models may be susceptible to a physical attack, allowing an untrusted source to tamper with the system firmware using a publicly disclosed private key. HP is providing recommended guidance for customers to reduce exposure to the potential vulnerability.

product.name: HP t430 and t638 Thin Clients

enisaIdProduct.product_version: See HP Security Bulletin for affected products.
